h2_title: Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Elder Amourworm sports a large creepy mask that you can see when it rears up, and it will use it to shoot out sticky threads in frontal arc. If you get caught, you'll have to mash to get out before being charged and attacked while unable to defend yourself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Amourworm', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Elder Amourworm sports a large creepy mask that you can see when it rears up, and it will use it to shoot out sticky threads in frontal arc. If you get caught, you'll have to mash to get out before being charged and attacked while unable to defend yourself.
